<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Electrify Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=3070) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Inventor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=408" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 29</row>

**Prerequisites**
[armor innovation](/Innovations.aspx?ID=1)

**Requirements**
You are wearing your armor innovation.

</column>

---

You electrify your armor to punish foes who dare to attack you. For 1 round, any creature that touches you, or that hits you with a melee [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack or a non-[reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) melee weapon attack, takes 1d4 electricity damage. The effect ends if you cease wearing your armor innovation.

 If you have the revolutionary innovation class feature, the damage increases to 2d4.

 **Unstable Function** You create an unstable chain reaction, sending countless sparks dancing across your armor. Add the [unstable](/Traits.aspx?ID=416) trait to Electrify Armor. The effects last for 1 minute instead of 1 round, and the damage dice increase from d4s to d12s.
name: Electrify Armor
requirement: You are wearing your armor innovation.
